name: JITTS
description:
A new revolution has come to logistics! Just In Time Train Scheduling is the gosh darn thing you need to get things from where they are, to where they need to be! We only have one rule here, "Our trains, never stop!"

Flip junctions and manage your trains to ensure maximum efficiency and to prevent inter-locomotive collisions.

Made in a massively over-ambitious 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Credits:

Level Designer and Chief of Not Understanding Git:  Cathan Gormley

Game Art and Graphic Design: Pippa Hobbs

Sound Design and Executive Voice Actor: Robert Clarke

Code Slaves: Matthew Sullivan and Russell Nairn
